argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_cosval | |- ( A e. CC -> ( cos ` A ) = ( ( ( exp ` ( _i x. A ) ) + ( exp ` ( -u _i x. A ) ) ) / 2 ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_cosval | |- ( ( A + ( K x. ( 2 x. _pi ) ) ) e. CC -> ( cos ` ( A + ( K x. ( 2 x. _pi ) ) ) ) = ( ( ( exp ` ( _i x. ( A + ( K x. ( 2 x. _pi ) ) ) ) ) + ( exp ` ( -u _i x. ( A + ( K x. ( 2 x. _pi ) ) ) ) ) ) / 2 ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_sinperlem | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ K e. ZZ ) -> ( cos ` ( A + ( K x. ( 2 x. _pi ) ) ) ) = ( cos ` A ) ) |
